articles.title: Mexico Discusses Aliens After Lawmaker Presents 'Extra-Terrestrial' Bodies - NDTV
articles.description: Mexican lawmakers heard testimony that "we are not alone" in the universe and saw the alleged remains of non-human beings in an extraordinary hearing marking the Latin American country's first congressional event on UFOs.
articles.content:
Remains of an allegedly 'non-human' being on display in the Mexico parliament.
Mexico City: Mexican lawmakers heard testimony that "we are not alone" in the universe and saw the alleged remains of n… [+3085 chars]
